## Type of Change

- [ ] Methodology update (change to core method documents)
- [ ] Template update (modification to artifact templates)

## RJW-IDD Governance Checklist

- [ ] **Decision record created** — If methodology change, `DEC-####` documents the rationale
- [ ] **Change log updated** — Entry in `rjw-idd-methodology/docs/change-log.md`
- [ ] **Markdown linting passes** — No linting errors
